doc.name: printTextStyle
doc.summary: Has no effect and is included in LiveCode for compatibility with imported HyperCard stacks.

description.p: In HyperCard, the printTextStyle property specifies the styles of printed text. In LiveCode, only cards can be printed, and the style of text on the card is determined by the textStyle property of objects that display text..
By default, the value of printTextStyle is plain. A handler can set the property, but the new setting has no effect.
